If the pet dog has not been vaccinated or has been partially vaccinated, then the 
treatment may be the same as for stray dog bite. The doctor will decide this and 
his advice should be followed.
Snake bite
In the case of a snake bite:
✱  A tight bandage should be tied above the level of the 
bite, if it is on the arm or leg. This stops the poison from 
spreading to other parts of the body. The bandage should 
NOT be so tight as to stop the flow of blood completely.. The affected person should be checked to see the colour of the fingers or toes. If the colour changes to dark blue, 
then the bandage is too tight and must be loosened AT 
ONCE.  
✱ One should not make a cut to try and remove the poison.
